    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3118</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reading Cards -No 18:The Sabre Tooth Tiger</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lesekarten - Kein 18:The SABRE Zahn-Tiger</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cartes de Lecture - Aucun Tigre de Dent de 18:The 
Sabre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cartões Da Leitura - Nenhum Tigre Do Dente De 
18:The Sabre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Schedi Della Lettura - Nessuna Tigre Del Dente Di 
18:The Sabre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάρτες ανάγνωσης - καμία τίγρη δοντιών 18:The 
Sabre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tarjetas De la Lectura - Ningún Tigre Del Diente 
De 18:The SABRE</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a short reading comprehension assignment about tigers.THe student is reqired to write correct English sentences with facts about tigers</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sentences</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine kurze Leseerfassenanweisung über 
tigers.THe Kursteilnehmer ist- reqired, um korrekte englische 
Programmsätze mit Tatsachen über Tiger zu schreiben</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une affectation courte de compréhension de 
lecture au sujet d'étudiant de tigers.THe est reqired pour écrire 
des phrases anglaises correctes avec des faits sur des tigres</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma atribuição curta da compreensão da 
leitura sobre o estudante de tigers.THe é reqired para escrever 
sentenças inglesas corretas com fatos sobre tigres</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un'assegnazione corta di comprensione 
della lettura circa l'allievo di tigers.THe è reqired per scrivere le
frasi inglesi corrette con i fatti circa le tigri</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια σύντομη ανάθεση κατανόησης ανάγνωσης 
για το σπουδαστή τιγρών THe είναι για να γράψει τις σωστές 
αγγλικές προτάσεις με τα γεγονότα για τις τίγρες</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una asignación corta de la comprensión 
de la lectura sobre estudiante de tigers.THe es reqired para escribir 
sentencias inglesas correctas con hechos sobre tigres</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Programmsätze</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
